title: Judge headed to IL, but 'it could've been worse'
description: New York right fielder Aaron Judge will go on the 10-day injured list with a flexor strain in his right elbow. But in a positive development for the Yankees and their superstar, a scan did not show damage in the two-time MVP's ulnar collateral ligament.
author: Jorge Castillo

title: Stewart (leg) exits Liberty game after 3 minutes
description: Liberty star Breanna Stewart left the team's game against the Sparks on Saturday night after three minutes with a lower leg injury.

title: 'We're not underdogs' - England seek redemption against Spain
description: England are hoping for redemption in Sunday's Euro 2025 final as they take on Spain in a repeat of the 2023 World Cup final.

title: Arsenal's striker hunt is over - but what will Gyokeres bring?
description: Viktor Gyokeres has signed for Arsenal but what are the Swede's attributes?

title: Verstappen wins Spa Sprint for Red Bull in first race since Horner sacking
description: Max Verstappen held off McLaren's Oscar Piastri and Lando Norris to claim a Belgian Grand Prix Sprint victory for Red Bull in the team's first race since Christian Horner's sacking.

title: England have shown fight - but now their football needs to do the talking
description: England know their tournament-defining style of organised chaos wonâ€™t be enough to beat Spain.

title: Bichette lifts surging Blue Jays to 6-1 win over slumping Tigers
author: DAVE HOGG

title: Connor Zilisch gives JR Motorsports its 100th Xfinity win with Indy triumph
description: Connor Zilisch scores his third Xfinity win in a row.
